actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the Courthouse and Post Office Building at 83 Meeting Street in Charleston, South Carolina, as the "Ernest Frederick Hollings Charleston Judicial Building".

summary.text: Designates a building on Meeting Street in Charleston, South Carolina, as the Ernest Frederick Hollings Charleston Judicial Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Courthouse and Post Office Building at 83 Meeting Street in Charleston, South Carolina, as the "Ernest Frederick Hollings Charleston Judicial Building".
